title: Thousandfold: Starting a Movement from Zero
description: A free to access history platform began in December 2012 by a single author writing somewhere in the archipelago, Filipino Historian has helped usher public history into the digital age with solid presence all over the web.The movement it spearheaded to uphold the advocacy for history, civics, and culture has over 5,200 members and 65,000 followers as of writing time. It also reaches an average of a million people each day through its various activities.Starting from zero, this is the thousandfold story of the Filipino Historian.[Published in commemoration of the tenth anniversary of the Filipino Historian]
author: Arius Lauren Raposas
